name: quash
effect: Forces the target to act last this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority. If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
short_effect: Makes the target act last this turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.
